title: Citrix security advisory (AV25-543)
description: On August 26, 2025, Citrix published a security advisory to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway 14.1  versions prior to 1-47.48
NetScaler ADC and NetScaler Gateway 13.1  versions prior to1-59.22
NetScaler ADC 13.1-FIPS and NDcPP  versions prior to1-37.241-FIPS and NDcPP
NetScaler ADC 12.1-FIPS and NDcPP  versions prior to1-55.330-FIPS and NDcPP
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
